des:
About the "Smart Elfin":
Smart Elfin is a global intelligent platform that supports a variety of smart devices such as lights, switches, sockets, water heaters and so on. After you bind your "Smart Elfin" account, you can use the Alexa to control your multi-brand and category devices.

Use the tutorial:
1. Download the app
You can download "Smart Elfin" App in the Android or iOS App Market, register and log in.
2. Equipment distribution network
a. Install the device and power it on, and enter the distribution mode according to the device instructions.
b. Log in to "Smart Elfin" and enter the Add Device page in the upper right corner of the homepage.
c. Click the “WIFI” button on the page, select the distribution mode and enter the WIFI password in the connection to start the distribution network.
d. App appears on the homepage of the App and can be controlled by the App.
3. Bind the Skill on the Alexa
a. Open the "Amazon Alexa" App, search for "Smart Elfin" skill
b. Select "Smart Elfin Pro" And Click the "Enable Skill" to jump to the account binding page.
c. Available: AUTH CODE (obtained in "Smart Elfin"-> "I" -> "More Services" -> "Alexa" page) or PASSWORD (registered in "Smart Elfin") to Bind user
d. Choose the appropriate way to complete the account binding authorization
4. Device control
After completing the above operations, you can control the device through the Alexa speaker like these:
“Alexa, discover my devices.”
“Alexa, turn on the fan.”
“Alexa, turn off the fan.”
“Alexa, set the fan speed to 20.”
“Alexa, increase the fan speed.”
“Alexa, decrease the fan speed.”
"Alexa, set the fan mode to sleep."
"Alexa, set the fan mode to nature."
"Alexa, set the fan rotation to summer."
"Alexa, set the fan rotation to winter."
"Alexa, turn on the yellow light."
"Alexa, turn up the yellow light brightness."
...
